attributes.action: stop wasting money on the territorial army.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Millions of pounds every year are wasted funding Territorial Army Centres and Soldiers, very few of which actually support the Regular Army.  

Scrap the TA, and put more funding into the Regular Army, and use a force of Volunteers to support, like the police force do.
